content: this legal case involves a dispute over the distribution of assets including immovable property and funds in a deceased persons estate the court has determined that the forced heirs including the deceaseds daughter and granddaughters are entitled to a portion of these assets however there have been issues with the valuation of the property and the calculation of the forced shares the court of appeal has overturned the initial order and sent the case back to the lower court for a new trial the court will reassess the value of the property and consider the investments made by the deceased the court has found that there was a deprivation of forced shares and will reduce the testamentary dispositions to allocate a portion of the property to the grandchildren the case is ongoing and further proceedings will be held to clarify the valuation and determine the rightful inheritance of the parties involved
